name: Vpet (itch)
description:
Update: Now works on Mobile!

This is a virtual pet game I made in Godot. Feed, pet and take care of this cute sweet pet and don't let it die!

Tap the icons to interact with the pet!

Or

Use the arrow keys and enter to choose items from the menu. I know it's not mobile friendly but I'm a noob.

In case you can't tell, the menu options are:

  • Status - Check the Status of your pet.
  • Feed - Feed your pet!
  • Toilet - Make your pet go potty
  • Rest - Sleep to restore Energy
  • Heal - Feed your pet medicine if it becomes sick
  • Pet - Give your pet some pets!

The Stats in the Status menu are:

  • HUNger - How hungry your pet is. It gets hungry over time, so keep it fed!
  • Health Points - How healthy overall your pet is, if it isn't very healthy it might get sick!
  • Poo Need - How much your pet needs to use the potty
  • Love - How much affection and attention you show your pet
  • Energy - How active the pet is, rest restores energy.

More notes:

  • If you leave poo unattended, your pet can get sick and die with enough neglect
  • Pet the pet lots!
